name: Wanna try Edo style oasis in the heart of Japan ?
description: How about experience the real Japanese relaxation? You can warm your body and mind in this place "Oedo-Onsen Monogatari" which is a natural onsen (hot spring) theme park in the Odaiba area near Tokyo Bay. The Oedo Onsen is much more than a bath house. Extravagantly decorated to bring visitors to the Edo era, it has a large and charming entertainment area that is ideal for everyone to experience a fun and special treat for people of all ages.
